title: Vanilla Ice - Cool As Ice (HDTV) Movie 1991
description:
THE OLD TEEN REBEL SAGA IS UPDATED FOR THE RAP CROWD, UNFORTUNATELY RAPPER VANILLA ICE IS THE TEEN. ICE SHOWS UP ON A NEON-YELLOW MOTORCYCLE WHICH GETS EVERY ONE'S ATTENTION, INCLUDING THE FEMALE HONOR STUDENT WHO HAS NEVER HAD A REBELLIOUS BONE IN HER BODY.

 CAST
 Vanilla Ice ...  John 'Johnny' Van Owen 

 Kristin Minter ...  Kathy Winslow 
 Deezer D ...  Jazz 

 John Newton ...  Nick (as John Haymes Newton) 

 Naomi Campbell ...  Singer
 Bobbie Brown ...   Monique

 Kathryn Morris ...  Jen 
 Crawford Binion ...  Cop 
 Tracey Bass ...  Singer at final club

RATING: PG

RUNTIME: 91 mins


...Yeah, yeah, yeah we know it's probably the worst movie ever made, but it has that certain factor you just can't help having a love/hate relationship with. Maybe it's the novelty of seeing V-Ice trying to act for the first time.  :D ....or, perhaps you lived through the early 90's wearing the same fluro pants.  :o Who knows? For me, these were great times and watching this movie brings back all the great memories! Either way, treat this movie more as a curiosity and be prepared for some real ".....ah what?!" corniness. Gotta Love The Ice-Man! 

ABOUT THIS RIP

OK, here's the deal. You've no doubt seen other versions of this movie being torrented about, which are mainly VHS or Laserdisc converts. These aren't too bad. The Laserdisc version being the best. 
Anyway, there is also a Widescreen 720p HDTV version which is awesome quality. In fact, close to DVD quality you're ever going to get hence the reason I've listed it as a "DVDrip". I'm guessing there will be a proper DVD release of this movie very soon!
Anyway, I have converted it to a smaller AVI file. I know the file size (1.78gb) may seem big, but I wanted to maintain as much quality close to the original as possible at 720x400 res. A 700mb file just doesn't cut it!
 
I've tried many conversion type programs using the same settings and all failed dismally in quality except one ."Any DVD Converter Pro" gave an awesome result!
You certainly won't be dissappointed with this version!
Converts to DVD using programs like "ConvertxtoDVD" or "NERO" very well.

Enjoy!
